## ouroctl get screen-configs

Retrieve screen configs

### Synopsis

Retrieves all screen configs as json that can be used to create or update screen configs in the system.

```
ouroctl get screen-configs [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  ouroctl get screen-configs
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for screen-configs
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -z, --data   fill the template with data from the system
```
